  16. (* Helper functions when writing actions *)

  18. open Ocamltest_stdlib

  20. ‌let skip_with_reason reason =
  21.   let code _log env =
  22.     let result = Result.skip_with_reason reason in
  23.     (result, env)
  24.   in
  25.   Actions.make ~name:"skip" ~description:"Skip the test" code

  27. ‌let pass_or_skip test pass_reason skip_reason _log env =
  28.   let open Result in
  29.   let result =
  30.     if test
  31.     then pass_with_reason pass_reason
  32.     else skip_with_reason skip_reason in
  33.   (result, env)

  35. ‌let mkreason what commandline exitcode =
  36.   Printf.sprintf "%s: command\n%s\nfailed with exit code %d"
  37.     what commandline exitcode

  39. ‌let testfile env =
  40.   match Environments.lookup Builtin_variables.test_file env with
  41.   | None -> assert false
  42.   | Some t -> t

  44. ‌let test_source_directory env =
  45.   Environments.safe_lookup Builtin_variables.test_source_directory env

  47. ‌let test_build_directory env =
  48.   Environments.safe_lookup Builtin_variables.test_build_directory env

  50. ‌let test_build_directory_prefix env =
  51.   Environments.safe_lookup Builtin_variables.test_build_directory_prefix env

  53. ‌let words_of_variable env variable =
  54.   String.words (Environments.safe_lookup variable env)

  56. ‌let exit_status_of_variable env variable =
  57.   try int_of_string
  58.     (Environments.safe_lookup variable env)
  59.   with _ -> 0

  61. ‌let readonly_files env = words_of_variable env Builtin_variables.readonly_files

  63. ‌let subdirectories env = words_of_variable env Builtin_variables.subdirectories

  65. ‌let setup_symlinks test_source_directory build_directory files =
  66.   let symlink filename =
  67.     (* Emulate ln -sfT *)
  68.     let src = Filename.concat test_source_directory filename in
  69.     let dst = Filename.concat build_directory filename in
  70.     let () =
  71.       if Sys.file_exists dst then
  72.         if Sys.win32 && Sys.is_directory dst then
  73.           (* Native symbolic links to directories don't disappear with unlink;
  74.              doing rmdir here is technically slightly more than ln -sfT would
  75.              do *)
  76.           Sys.rmdir dst
  77.         else
  78.           Sys.remove dst
  79.     in
  80.       Unix.symlink src dst in
  81. ‌  let copy filename =
  82.     let src = Filename.concat test_source_directory filename in
  83.     let dst = Filename.concat build_directory filename in
  84.     Sys.copy_file src dst in
  85. ‌  let f = if Unix.has_symlink () then symlink else copy in
  86.   Sys.make_directory build_directory;
  87.   List.iter f files

  89. ‌let setup_subdirectories source_directory build_directory subdirs =
  90.   let full_src_path name = Filename.concat source_directory name in
  91.   let full_dst_path name = Filename.concat build_directory name in
  92.   let cp_dir name =
  93.     Sys.copy_directory (full_src_path name) (full_dst_path name)
  94.   in
  95.   List.iter cp_dir subdirs

  97. ‌let setup_build_env add_testfile additional_files (_log : out_channel) env =
  98.   let source_dir = (test_source_directory env) in
  99.   let build_dir = (test_build_directory env) in
  100.   let some_files = additional_files @ (readonly_files env) in
  101.   let files =
  102.     if add_testfile
  103.     then (testfile env) :: some_files
  104.     else some_files in
  105.   setup_symlinks source_dir build_dir files;
  106. ‌  let subdirs = subdirectories env in
  107.   setup_subdirectories source_dir build_dir subdirs;
  108.   Sys.chdir build_dir;
  109.   (Result.pass, env)

  111. ‌let setup_simple_build_env add_testfile additional_files log env =
  112.   let build_env = Environments.add
  113.     Builtin_variables.test_build_directory
  114.     (test_build_directory_prefix env) env in
  115.   setup_build_env add_testfile additional_files log build_env

  117. ‌let run_cmd
  118.     ?(environment=[||])
  119.     ?(stdin_variable=Builtin_variables.stdin)
  120.     ?(stdout_variable=Builtin_variables.stdout)
  121.     ?(stderr_variable=Builtin_variables.stderr)
  122.     ?(append=false)
  123.     ?timeout
  124.     log env original_cmd
  125.   =
  126.   let log_redirection std filename =
  127.     if filename<>"" then
  128.     begin
  129.       Printf.fprintf log "  Redirecting %s to %s \n%!" std filename
  130.     end in
  131. ‌  let cmd =
  132.     if (Environments.lookup_as_bool Strace.strace env) = Some true then
  133.     begin
  134.       let action_name = Environments.safe_lookup Actions.action_name env in
  135.       let test_build_directory = test_build_directory env in
  136.       let strace_logfile_name = Strace.get_logfile_name action_name in
  137.       let strace_logfile =
  138.         Filename.make_path [test_build_directory; strace_logfile_name]
  139.       in
  140.       let strace_flags = Environments.safe_lookup Strace.strace_flags env in
  141.       let strace_cmd =
  142.         ["strace"; "-f"; "-o"; strace_logfile; strace_flags]
  143.       in
  144.       strace_cmd @ original_cmd
  145.     end else original_cmd
  146.   in
  147. ‌  let lst = List.concat (List.map String.words cmd) in
  148. ‌  let quoted_lst =
  149.     if Sys.win32
  150.     then List.map Filename.maybe_quote lst
  151.     else lst in
  152. ‌  let cmd' = String.concat " " quoted_lst in
  153.   Printf.fprintf log "Commandline: %s\n" cmd';
  154. ‌  let progname = List.hd quoted_lst in
  155. ‌  let arguments = Array.of_list quoted_lst in
  156. ‌  let stdin_filename = Environments.safe_lookup stdin_variable env in
  157. ‌  let stdout_filename = Environments.safe_lookup stdout_variable env in
  158. ‌  let stderr_filename = Environments.safe_lookup stderr_variable env in
  159.   log_redirection "stdin" stdin_filename;
  160.   log_redirection "stdout" stdout_filename;
  161.   log_redirection "stderr" stderr_filename;
  162. ‌  let systemenv =
  163.     Environments.append_to_system_env
  164.       environment
  165.       env
  166.   in
  167. ‌  let timeout =
  168.     match timeout with
  169.     | Some timeout -> timeout
  170.     | None ->
  171. ‌        Option.value ~default:0
  172.           (Environments.lookup_as_int Builtin_variables.timeout env)
  173.   in
  174. ‌  let n =
  175.     Run_command.run {
  176.       Run_command.progname = progname;
  177.       Run_command.argv = arguments;
  178.       Run_command.envp = systemenv;
  179.       Run_command.stdin_filename = stdin_filename;
  180.       Run_command.stdout_filename = stdout_filename;
  181.       Run_command.stderr_filename = stderr_filename;
  182.       Run_command.append = append;
  183.       Run_command.timeout = timeout;
  184.       Run_command.log = log
  185.     }
  186.   in
  187. ‌  let dump_file s fn =
  188.     if not (Sys.file_is_empty fn) then begin
  189.       Printf.fprintf log "### begin %s ###\n" s;
  190.       Sys.dump_file log fn;
  191.       Printf.fprintf log "### end %s ###\n" s
  192.     end
  193.   in
  194.   dump_file "stdout" stdout_filename;
  195.   if stdout_filename <> stderr_filename then dump_file "stderr" stderr_filename;
  196.   n

  198. ‌let run
  199.     (log_message : string)
  200.     (redirect_output : bool)
  201.     (can_skip : bool)
  202.     (prog_variable : Variables.t)
  203.     (args_variable : Variables.t option)
  204.     (log : out_channel)
  205.     (env : Environments.t)
  206.   =
  207.   match Environments.lookup prog_variable env with
  208.   | None ->
  209.     let msg = Printf.sprintf "%s: variable %s is undefined"
  210.       log_message (Variables.name_of_variable prog_variable) in
  211.     (Result.fail_with_reason msg, env)
  212.   | Some program ->
  213.     let arguments = match args_variable with
  214.       | None -> ""
  215.       | Some variable -> Environments.safe_lookup variable env in
  216.     let commandline = [program; arguments] in
  217.     let what = log_message ^ " " ^ program ^ " " ^
  218.     begin if arguments="" then "without any argument"
  219.     else "with arguments " ^ arguments
  220.     end in
  221. ‌    let env =
  222.       if redirect_output
  223.       then begin
  224.         let output = Environments.safe_lookup Builtin_variables.output env in
  225.         let env =
  226.           Environments.add_if_undefined Builtin_variables.stdout output env
  227.         in
  228.         Environments.add_if_undefined Builtin_variables.stderr output env
  229.       end else env
  230.     in
  231. ‌    let expected_exit_status =
  232.       exit_status_of_variable env Builtin_variables.exit_status
  233.     in
  234. ‌    let exit_status = run_cmd log env commandline in
  235.     if exit_status=expected_exit_status
  236.     then (Result.pass, env)
  237.     else begin
  238. ‌      let reason = mkreason what (String.concat " " commandline) exit_status in
  239.       if exit_status = 125 && can_skip
  240.       then (Result.skip_with_reason reason, env)
  241.       else (Result.fail_with_reason reason, env)
  242.     end

  244. ‌let run_program =
  245.   run
  246.     "Running program"
  247.     true
  248.     false
  249.     Builtin_variables.program
  250.     (Some Builtin_variables.arguments)

  252. ‌let run_script log env =
  253.   let response_file = Filename.temp_file "ocamltest-" ".response" in
  254.   Printf.fprintf log "Script should write its response to %s\n%!"
  255.     response_file;
  256.   let scriptenv = Environments.add
  257.     Builtin_variables.ocamltest_response response_file env in
  258.   let (result, newenv) = run
  259.     "Running script"
  260.     true
  261.     true
  262.     Builtin_variables.script
  263.     None
  264.     log scriptenv in
  265.   let final_value =
  266.     if Result.is_pass result then begin
  267.       match Modifier_parser.modifiers_of_file response_file with
  268.       | modifiers ->
  269.         let modified_env = Environments.apply_modifiers newenv modifiers in
  270.         (result, modified_env)
  271.       | exception Failure reason ->
  272.         (Result.fail_with_reason reason, newenv)
  273.       | exception Variables.No_such_variable name ->
  274.         let reason =
  275.           Printf.sprintf "error in script response: unknown variable %s" name
  276.         in
  277.         (Result.fail_with_reason reason, newenv)
  278.     end else begin
  279.       let reason = String.trim (Sys.string_of_file response_file) in
  280.       let newresult = { result with Result.reason = Some reason } in
  281.       (newresult, newenv)
  282.     end
  283.   in
  284.   Sys.force_remove response_file;
  285.   final_value

  287. ‌let run_hook hook_name log input_env =
  288.   Printf.fprintf log "Entering run_hook for hook %s\n%!" hook_name;
  289.   let response_file = Filename.temp_file "ocamltest-" ".response" in
  290.   Printf.fprintf log "Hook should write its response to %s\n%!"
  291.     response_file;
  292.   let hookenv = Environments.add
  293.     Builtin_variables.ocamltest_response response_file input_env in
  294.   let systemenv =
  295.     Environments.to_system_env hookenv in
  296.   let timeout =
  297. ‌    Option.value ~default:0
  298.       (Environments.lookup_as_int Builtin_variables.timeout input_env) in
  299. ‌  let open Run_command in
  300.   let settings = {
  301.     progname = "sh";
  302.     argv = [|"sh"; Filename.maybe_quote hook_name|];
  303.     envp = systemenv;
  304.     stdin_filename = "";
  305.     stdout_filename = "";
  306.     stderr_filename = "";
  307.     append = false;
  308.     timeout = timeout;
  309.     log = log;
  310. ‌  } in let exit_status = run settings in
  311. ‌  let final_value = match exit_status with
  312.     | 0 ->
  313.       begin match Modifier_parser.modifiers_of_file response_file with
  314.       | modifiers ->
  315.         let modified_env = Environments.apply_modifiers hookenv modifiers in
  316.         (Result.pass, modified_env)
  317.       | exception Failure reason ->
  318.         (Result.fail_with_reason reason, hookenv)
  319.       | exception Variables.No_such_variable name ->
  320.         let reason =
  321.           Printf.sprintf "error in script response: unknown variable %s" name
  322.         in
  323.         (Result.fail_with_reason reason, hookenv)
  324.       end
  325.     | _ ->
  326.       Printf.fprintf log "Hook returned %d" exit_status;
  327.       let reason = String.trim (Sys.string_of_file response_file) in
  328.       if exit_status=125
  329.       then (Result.skip_with_reason reason, hookenv)
  330.       else (Result.fail_with_reason reason, hookenv)
  331.   in
  332.   Sys.force_remove response_file;
  333.   final_value

  335. ‌let check_output kind_of_output output_variable reference_variable log
  336.     env =
  337.   let to_int = function None -> 0 | Some s -> int_of_string s in
  338.   let skip_lines =
  339.     to_int (Environments.lookup Builtin_variables.skip_header_lines env) in
  340.   let skip_bytes =
  341.     to_int (Environments.lookup Builtin_variables.skip_header_bytes env) in
  342.   let reference_filename = Environments.safe_lookup reference_variable env in
  343.   let output_filename = Environments.safe_lookup output_variable env in
  344.   Printf.fprintf log "Comparing %s output %s to reference %s\n%!"
  345.     kind_of_output output_filename reference_filename;
  346.   let files =
  347.   {
  348.     Filecompare.filetype = Filecompare.Text;
  349.     Filecompare.reference_filename = reference_filename;
  350.     Filecompare.output_filename = output_filename
  351.   } in
  352.   let ignore_header_conf = {
  353.       Filecompare.lines = skip_lines;
  354.       Filecompare.bytes = skip_bytes;
  355.     } in
  356.   let tool =
  357.     Filecompare.make_cmp_tool ~ignore:ignore_header_conf in
  358.   match Filecompare.check_file ~tool files with
  359.     | Filecompare.Same -> (Result.pass, env)
  360.     | Filecompare.Different ->
  361.       let diff = Filecompare.diff files in
  362.       let diffstr = match diff with
  363.         | Ok difference -> difference
  364.         | Error diff_file -> ("See " ^ diff_file) in
  365.       let reason =
  366.         Printf.sprintf "%s output %s differs from reference %s: \n%s\n"
  367.         kind_of_output output_filename reference_filename diffstr in
  368.       if Environments.lookup_as_bool Builtin_variables.promote env = Some true
  369.       then begin
  370.         Printf.fprintf log "Promoting %s output %s to reference %s\n%!"
  371.           kind_of_output output_filename reference_filename;
  372.         Filecompare.promote files ignore_header_conf;
  373.       end;
  374.       (Result.fail_with_reason reason, env)
  375.     | Filecompare.Unexpected_output ->
  376. ‌      let banner = String.make 40 '=' in
  377. ‌      let unexpected_output = Sys.string_of_file output_filename in
  378. ‌      let unexpected_output_with_banners = Printf.sprintf
  379.         "%s\n%s%s\n" banner unexpected_output banner in
  380. ‌      let reason = Printf.sprintf
  381.         "The file %s was expected to be empty because there is no \
  382.           reference file %s but it is not:\n%s\n"
  383.         output_filename reference_filename unexpected_output_with_banners in
  384.       (Result.fail_with_reason reason, env)
  385.     | Filecompare.Error (commandline, exitcode) ->
  386. ‌      let reason = Printf.sprintf "The command %s failed with status %d"
  387.         commandline exitcode in
  388.       (Result.fail_with_reason reason, env)
